programme.title: Tmo Jangan Ambil Nyawa Aku
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Jangan Ambil Nyawa Aku

programme.title: Cara Mengundang Hantu
programme.desc: Himpunan empat filem pendek yang memaparkan kisah empat mangsa gangguan hantu akibat salah laku mereka sendiri.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Tilam Lama Tukar Baru
programme.desc: Lima orang sahabat, Aiman, Nuara, Tiara, Ramu dan Stanley telah menjumpai sebuah tilam lama. mereka terjumpa sepucuk surat yang terselit di celahan tilam itu. Dalam surat itu menceritakan tentang seorang ibu yang merindui kepulangan anaknya, Kamal yang merantau jauh.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar
programme.desc: Seorang gangster veteran, Dollah yang selalu bermimpi menjadi pelakon mendapat peluang seumur hidup apabila pelakon popular memintanya untuk menjadi mentornya untuk filem aksi. Seorang samseng di lokasi penggambaran, Dollah pasti menimbulkan pelbagai kekacauan.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Wanda seorang gadis kampung yang datang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja di sebuah Caf milik makciknya, telah bertemu dengan seorang jejaka yang gila dengan masakan Kari dan Wanda seorang yang hanya pandai memasak Tom Yam yang akhirnya menjadi satu cinta. Pelbagai dugaan dan telatah mereka berdua yang ditempuh semasa mengenali antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Tmo Abang Saya Ustaz
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Abang Saya Ustaz

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Adakah Aku Bersalah
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Hamzah yang meyelamatkan seorang gadis, Tia (Farah Nabilah) dari bekas suaminya yang baran dan sanggup mengadaikan maruah isterinya demi wang.

programme.title: Insan Terpilih
programme.desc: Hidup Firdaus tidak terurus seperti orang lain. Setiap hari dia akan mengeliling kampung mengutip sampah dan mencuci surau malah akan mengutip najis cicak yang berselerak di dalam surau dengan menggunakan tangannya. Katanya, jika dia mengguna penyapu, pahala akan menjadi sedikit. Ustaz Zaki sangat kagum dengan Firdaus walaupun dia begitu tetapi dia rajin mencari pahala dan tidak mengambil kesempatan atas orang lain. Dalam keadaannya sedemikian, ada segelintir anak-anak kampung menggelarnya Firdaus Gila. Malah Firdaus juga sering diganggu oleh Leman, pemuda kampung yang nakal dan menggelarkan Firdaus busuk.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep15
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Validasi
programme.desc: Nina dan Muna selalu bertengkar di media sosial untuk melihat siapa yang mempunyai pengikut yang lebih tinggi dan siapa yang mengumpul like yang lebih banyak. Persaingan mereka bertukar menjadi buruk apabila sikap buruk Nina dan Muna mula terbongkar.

programme.title: Cendera Kasih
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang ditinggalkan isterinya akibat perbuatan ibunya sendiri berjumpa semula dengan isterinya apabila ditugaskan menguruskan projek di kedah . Lelaki yang masih sayangkan isteri dan anaknya itu merayu supaya isterinya pulang ke pangkuannya

programme.title: Tilam Lama Tukar Baru
programme.desc: Lima orang sahabat, Aiman, Nuara, Tiara, Ramu dan Stanley telah menjumpai sebuah tilam lama. mereka terjumpa sepucuk surat yang terselit di celahan tilam itu. Dalam surat itu menceritakan tentang seorang ibu yang merindui kepulangan anaknya, Kamal yang merantau jauh.

programme.title: Tmo Abang Saya Ustaz
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Abang Saya Ustaz

programme.title: Sate
programme.desc: Terdapat seorang gadis di sebuah bandar yang menjalani kehidupan hariannya dengan menjual sate di warung bapanya. Dan di sebelah warung tersebut terdapat sebuah kedai membaiki peralatan letrikdimilik oleh seorang pemuda. Mereka berkawan rapat dan masing-masing menyimpan perasaan kerana malu untuk berterus-terang.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Leraian Mimpi
programme.desc: Zakiah telah mendapat tawaran sebagai pelakon drama dan di bawah bimbingan Sarah seorang pengarah terkenal, bakatnya telah berkembang dan telah dinobatkan sebagai pelakon wanita terbaik. seperti janjinya kepada ibunya, menjaga nama baik diri dan keluarganya meski pun ada usaha daripada pihak-pihak tertentu yang cuba mengheretnya ke kancah kontroversi.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Mendang Mending Bos Ganteng Kadang Bikin Aku Kesel
programme.desc: Tito, seorang bos yang pemarah dan menjengkelkan. Walau bagaimanapun, kerana dipaksa untuk berkahwin, Ayu, di pejabat untuk berpura-pura menjadi kekasihnya.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep189
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep53
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Temu Lawak Ep5
programme.desc: Temu Lawak adalah rancangan komedi dengan kumpulan legenda Srimulat yang akan membuat kemunculan semula melalui rancangan ini. Turut dimeriahkan oleh ramai pelawak dan artis undangan. Di Temu Lawak, pelawak bersatu kembali dengan kisah kontemporari yang dibalut dengan komedi gaya Srimulat.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep157
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep189
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Cantik, Review Gebetannya Dong
programme.desc: Rangga cuba mendekati Wulan dengan membantu untuk memulihkan ingatannya dan mengajaknya tinggal bersama ibunya. Adakah mereka akan menyukai satu sama lain?

programme.title: Lara Ati Ep5
programme.desc: Cerita ini berkisar tentang empat orang lelaki yang hadir untuk satu sama lain dan saling membantu menghadapi sakit hati (lara ati) yang mereka alami dalam kehidupan masing-masing.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep43
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep18
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Spill Mba Jagonya Dong Kak
programme.desc: Jangan sesekali memandang rendah Rina walaupun dia perempuan, dia adalah ketua samseng di kampungnya. Rina beberapa kali melumpuhkan samseng yang menyusahkan kampung yang akhirnya menjadi orang bawahannya. Rina mendapat ilmu pertahanan diri daripada arwah bapanya Abah Johar, seorang jaguh terkenal. Penduduk mungkin menyukai Rina yang jaguh tetapi tidak bersama ibunya. Puan Isah merasakan dia gagal mendidik anaknya menjadi gadis anggun seperti yang lain. Kerana itu, Rina dan Puan Isah tidak pernah sehaluan.

Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Tutorial Cinta Mantul Neng Citul
programme.desc: Intan, seorang penjual cilung yang cantik dan baik hati. Namun, pada suatu ketika, Intan terlibat dalam konflik dengan kekasihnya, tetapi dia malah dibela oleh adik lelaki kekasihnya. Akhirnya, dua beradik yang kacak ini bersaing untuk mendapatkan perhatian Intan.

programme.title: Lara Ati Ep7
programme.desc: Cerita ini berkisar tentang empat orang lelaki yang hadir untuk satu sama lain dan saling membantu menghadapi sakit hati (lara ati) yang mereka alami dalam kehidupan masing-masing.

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ep5
programme.desc: Helo para guru dan murid-murid sekolah rendah di seluruh Indonesia! Uji pengetahuan dan ketangkasan dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat dalam Juara Indonesia.

programme.title: LIDA 2021 Ep6
programme.desc: LIDA 2021 ialah rancangan hiburan Dangdut terbesar dan no 1 di Indonesia. LIDA 2021 merupakan musim keempat Liga Dangdut Indonesia dan pemenang musim ini juga dijangka menjadi generasi dangdut Indonesia seterusnya.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Min-jun and Ji-won are first-rate "players" who are used to getting their way in the field of love and sex -- until they run into each other.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husbands funeral.

programme.title: Dancing Queen
programme.desc: A married couple in the midst of their mundane lives decides to pursue their lost dreams. The husband finds himself accidentally running for Mayor of Seoul and his wife decides to become a pop singer.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: She'S On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class

programme.title: Share Life
programme.desc: Focusing on the life of the youngsters with Shanghai as the story background, six guests of different ages, occupations and genders would share life for 105 days because of various reasons. The observation group includes G.E.M., Li Dan, Chen Jian Bin, Wei Da Xun, Zeng Ke Ni, and Yang Li.

programme.title: Classical Pieces As My Guide
programme.desc: Luo Yizhou, Linghe Zhang, Xiaolong Zhang, David Wang, Dylan Wang, Jenny Zeng are invited to the creation place of masterpieces handed down from generation to generation. The connotation is expressed in a modern way, highlighting the continuation and inheritance of Chinese civilization.

programme.title: An Exciting Offer Season 4
programme.desc: The reality show of this season is to focus 10 young architectural interns to work in Beijing Institute of Architectural Design for a month. ChunYe Zhang, Nicholas Tse, Jason Zhang, Xueqin Li, Gabrielle Guan, etc. formed as cheer up team to witness their passionate growth process.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2017)
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Masked Dancing King 2022 (Repackaged)
programme.desc: New interpretation and concept to show the national dancing culture!

programme.title: Cheer Up! Little Shops
programme.desc: A special edition to record the lifestyles and attitudes towards the value of life of Cecilia Cheung, Betty Wu, Shen Meng Chen, etc.

programme.title: Share Life
programme.desc: Focusing on the life of the youngsters with Shanghai as the story background, six guests of different ages, occupations and genders would share life for 105 days because of various reasons. The observation group includes G.E.M., Li Dan, Chen Jian Bin, Wei Da Xun, Zeng Ke Ni, and Yang Li.

programme.title: The Talent
programme.desc: The program setting is based on eight concepts while the teenagers would have to use creative thinking to stimulate their imagination and use paper and pen, as well as programming, to solve different problems. Finally, the one who can fulfill all of the concepts would be picked. The guests include Ma Qing Yun, Annie Yi, and Sunnee.

programme.title: Yell For Fun
programme.desc: Bosco Wong, Chen Zhuoxuan, Li Yajuan, Wang Mian, Zhang Jiayuan, Zhang Xiaowan, etc. who are entrusted to formulate a themed carnival full of wild fun every week. They used their creativity to turn a wilderness into a place integrating art, fashion and wild fun. It presents a variety show feast that expresses the "wild" attitude of contemporary young people.

programme.title: City All In Tribe Season 2
programme.desc: A reality show to invite Justin Huang, Hankiz Omar, Li Hongyi, Victor Qin, Zhao Xiaotang with other guests to unlock the new style of the city with a new and upgraded story-style gameplay. They will play via games and challenges for audience to know more about the cities. What a good energetic and humorous way to discover the local charismas.

programme.title: Our stories
programme.desc: Hosted by Hua Shao, the show invites a group of guests in each episode to discuss social development and humanistic spirit, and discover the unique cultural concepts and implications of the era. The guests include Nie Wen Ping, Deng Ya Ping, Ke Jie, Gu Li, etc.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2017)
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Informal Talks Season 7
programme.desc: The program is a Chinese talk show with culture discussion. Four members, Ryan Zuo, Di Yang, Ming Chen and Cynthia Chan, act as the presidium gathered with 11 representatives from different countries who all spoken in Putonghua share their opinions in a humorous manner.

programme.title: Cheer Up! Little Shops
programme.desc: A special edition to record the lifestyles and attitudes towards the value of life of Cecilia Cheung, Betty Wu, Shen Meng Chen, etc.

They used their creativity to turn a wilderness into a place integrating art, fashion and wild fun. It presents a variety show feast that expresses the "wild" attitude of contemporary young people.

programme.title: Share Life
programme.desc: Focusing on the life of the youngsters with Shanghai as the story background, six guests of different ages, occupations and genders would share life for 105 days because of various reasons. The observation group includes G.E.M., Li Dan, Chen Jian Bin, Wei Da Xun, Zeng Ke Ni, and Yang Li.

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: Informal Talks Season 7
programme.desc: The program is a Chinese talk show with culture discussion. Four members, Ryan Zuo, Di Yang, Ming Chen and Cynthia Chan, act as the presidium gathered with 11 representatives from different countries who all spoken in Putonghua share their opinions in a humorous manner.

programme.title: The Culture Sit-down with Wang Xiaohui Season 3
programme.desc: The documentary records the Decade Witnesses who participate on national infrastructure and construction, experienced great changes on profound modification.

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3
programme.desc: Nicky Wu and new members like Raymond Lam, Ryan Ding, Lin Yun and Zhao Xiaotang are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. Lets share the sense of healing in the trip!

programme.title: Go! Dreamland
programme.desc: Three celebrities, Jeff Chang, Ele Yan, Sean Tang, organized a five-day and four-night trip to Lijiang Ancient City. They completed immersive creation to develop a sound-seeking journey.

programme.title: The Honorable Chef
programme.desc: Four top catering masters representing diners and restaurant operators were invited to form a jury panel to evaluate the creations and outstanding culinary skills of the chef contestants. Lets see who will become the Honorable Chef!

programme.title: Pet Doctor Season 2
programme.desc: This program records all kinds of cute pets, showing warmth and healing and professionalism to convey warmth, easier to connect and understand with sincerity. Lets have a new understanding of pet doctors.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep274
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep466

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep1213
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep18

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3391
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47134714
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep171172
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3683
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47144715
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep5
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep173174
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47144715

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2094
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep964
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Hero Among Heroes
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung assists Lin Ze Xu to crack down the opium trading in Guangzhou. Barac provokes Beggar So to kill Wong and Lin as they hinder his opium business. When So finally resolves his misunderstanding with Wong, he decides to join Wong to defeat Barac and stop the opium import.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men 2
programme.desc: Continuing from Ah Boys to Men, Ken returns to barracks, determined to change because of his bedridden father, and becomes a model recruit. However, his comrades think Ken wants to flatter and show off only, and repel him. Although Ken wants to explain, misunderstanding gets deepen through days. Can they unite and overcome the challenge together?

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Kung fu comedy meets action as the Shaolin monks, Brother White and Brother Black, take on the evil King of the Vampires and his unstoppable army of Darkness.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, The Eagle Shooting Heroes is loosely based on Louis Chas classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hungs action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppys owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: A band of courageous bodyguards is tasked with escorting the daughter of general, the concubine of the recently deceased Ming emperor Wu Sangui, and her son, who is the last hope of the Ming Dynasty, to safety.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobras blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his fathers old rival.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Chik, one of the assassins of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to leave the clan when a kind family saved him. When pursued by the clan, a swordsman whose wife was killed by him saved his life. They decide to jointly take revenge on the clan.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Devil's Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his fathers death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: Tamil Action Love Movie, Starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Madonna Sebastian, T. Rajenda, Vikranth, Chandini Tamilarasan & Others

programme.title: Idhu Kadhirvelan Kadhal
programme.desc: Tamil Love Comedy Film, Starring, Nayantara, Udhayanidhi Stalin, Santhanam, Chaya Singh, Saranya Ponvannan & Others

programme.title: Yaagaravaraiynum Naa Kaakka
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed action-drama-thriller , Yaagavaraayinum Naa Kakka is a genuine, properly sketched tale of friendship, love, hatred and possessiveness with Aadhi, Mithun Chakraborthy and Nikki Galrani in the lead roles

programme.title: Kappal
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Vaibhav Reddy, Sonam Bajwa, Karunakaran, VTV Ganesh & Others

programme.title: Kho Kho
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Rajisha Vijayan, Mamitha Baiju & Others

programme.title: Mo
programme.desc: Tamil horror comedy film, Suresh Ravi, Aishwarya Rajesh, Ramesh Thilak, and Darbuka Siva

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Nenjam Marapadhillai
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Thriller Film, Starring, S. J. Suryah, Nandita Swetha and Regina Cassandra

programme.title: Velan

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: After taking the blame for the honor killing of his sister and serving his sentence, Yusuf must return to his family and brother who committed the murder. Yusuf struggles to reconcile family and tradition with the guilt and regret he feels over her death.

programme.title: The Coroner: Exquisite Corpse
programme.desc: Alexandra, a forensic pathologist, is determined to piece together her latest assignment; only the foot and leg of a murder victim has been found. With caution thrown to the wind, she faces the killer head-on in order to recover the rest of the body parts.

Still lacking a sense of purpose, the group's black sheep has ditched his meds and given in to his natural impulses in a big way which, for Alan, means no boundaries, no filters and no judgment until a personal crisis forces him to finally seek the help he needs. programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy subject their friends to a series of secret experiments to discover who would be the most qualified to be Best Man and Maid of Honor at their wedding.

programme.title: Friends S8 22
programme.desc: Rachel's pregnancy goes beyond her projected delivery date.

programme.title: Gotham S1 22
programme.desc: In the season finale, Gotham Citys gang war reaches its boiling point, as Fish Mooney goes head-to-head with Maroni and Penguin in an attempt to restake her claim on the city.

programme.title: Pennyworth S2 4
programme.desc: Still haunted by tragedy, Alfred agrees to join Gully's team on an upcoming job. Meanwhile, pressure begins to take its toll on Harwood and direct him toward Project Stormcloud.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 2
programme.desc: Jesse finds a bin that is out of this world, while Team Brandori gambles on some dangerous games. New player Mone proves she's not here to play games - she is the game baby! And she's not afraid to find out what's inside the creepiest box yet!

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 12
programme.desc: When disaster strikes and Supergirl is busy, Kelly embraces her power and steps into her role as Guardian to lead the way and restore justice to her fallen community.

programme.title: Arrow S1 1
programme.desc: In the series premiere, billionaire Oliver Queen returns to Starling City after being stranded on a remote island for five years and adopts the persona of Arrow to fight crime.

programme.title: Pennyworth S2 4
programme.desc: Still haunted by tragedy, Alfred agrees to join Gully's team on an upcoming job. Meanwhile, pressure begins to take its toll on Harwood and direct him toward Project Stormcloud.

programme.desc: When Oliver sets his sights on a criminal with ties to the Chinese Triad, the villains send their top mercenary, China White (guest star Kelly Hu) to face The Arrow.

programme.title: Pennyworth S2 5
programme.desc: While Alfred and Daveboy run one last job for Gully in order to buy tickets to America, tensions ratchet up at Raven Union HQ between Harwood and his lieutenants.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 13
programme.desc: Supergirl & the team race Nyxly for control of a magical totem that controls courage, but each must first pass a test of courage. Meanwhile, Lena struggles with her newfound gift.

programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.desc: Trick or Treatment - Halloween night and the M*A*S*H unit is hopping. This adds to an already hectic night, with wounded arriving in droves from the front lines.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Tennis, Anyone? - George accepts Judge Markel's invitation to join the all-white Windsor Tennis Club for networking purposes, then finds out he was only invited to be the club's "token minority" and appease the local media.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S1 Ep05
programme.desc: His and Hers - Mr Grainger is shocked to find the central display stand has been removed from the floor. Grace Brothers has entered into an agreement with a company to display their new perfume, 'His and Hers'.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Used Karma - Jason breaks up with Phoebe when he finally learns her and her sisters are really witches. Richard attempts to free himself of his family's karma, and Piper and Paige try to vanquish a group of Swarm demons.

programme.title: Married... With Children S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Married... With Children - Peggy forces Al to sacrifice a basketball game and spend a torturous evening in conversation with new neighbors, idealistic newlyweds Steve and Marcy Rhoades.

programme.title: Married... With Children S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Thinergy - At the suggestion of her next-door-neighbor Marcy, Peggy goes on a "thinergy" diet in hopes of rekindling the flame in Al.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S7 Ep01
programme.desc: Demons - After 21 years, Ray Schenkel is released from jail. Retired officer William Dorsey who initially locked him up, is convinced he'll offend again and begs Detectives Benson and Stabler to put him away for good.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep03
programme.desc: Foreign Affairs - An injured North Korean pilot is taken to the 4077th and is met by Major Reddish, who believes that the pilot crashed the Soviet-built jet in order to collect a $100,000 reward and defect to the United States. The pilot is loyal to the North but the Major is persistent.

programme.desc: The Red Circle - Signor Zamba is murdered by a member of The Red Circle. Gorgiano murders Firmani and pursues Emilia and Gennaro. Mrs Warren asks Holmes to investigate her strange lodger who turns out to be Emilia.

programme.desc: Sequel to the blockbuster hit, the smart-talking Detroit cop shows the Beverly Hills force how to run business in an attempt to save his friend from an unjust dismissal.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep1
programme.desc: Cider - Gregg Wallace visits the biggest cider factory in the world, which produces more than 350 million litres each year.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Outcasts - As the urban world grows, animals are displaced from land that belonged to them. The stories of these wild outcasts are the most captivating of all.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Denby (Mugs) - Gregg Wallace visits the Denby factory in Derbyshire, which has been making pottery since 1809.

programme.title: The Green Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Seasonal Worlds - Journey with Sir David Attenborough into the magical hidden world of plants.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Havana - Joanna Lumley travels across two of the most enigmatic countries in the Caribbean - Cuba and Haiti. Joanna kicks off her adventure in the back of a classic car in Havana, outlining her 1500-mile Caribbean adventure.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Ridge of Fire Part 2 - Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Spanish Canary Island La Palma. The Cumbre Vieja eruption's destructive lava flow has ruined thousands of homes and lives.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Ed Helms - Actor Ed Helms faces sheer cliffs, crumbling rock and a cringeworthy dinner menu while atop Colorado mountains; Helms discusses the road to his career in comedy.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Operation Pelican - Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentinas coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Marias side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the centers aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote thats too people-friendly.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, Ixchel, who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - South Luangwa National Park is one of Africas great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africas Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. The fortune of every animal that lives here is inextricably linked to the two vastly different seasons they experience the wet and the dry.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Start of Trauma Season - Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep2

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who cant walk, and see how the medical team ensures hell be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep1

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep12
programme.desc: Check in with the centres resident turkey vulture, whos ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Crossing the Danakil - The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Forests - Australia is home to the world's most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it's a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can bite, poison or maim.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazils Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland: Ice - Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Bay of Fundy - Step into the Bay of Fundys surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures, including hundreds of thousands of seabirds, the worlds fastest predator, and a complex web of invertebrates.

programme.desc: Hawaii - Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Forests - Australia is home to the world's most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it's a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can bite, poison or maim.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazils Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland: Ice - Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Bay of Fundy - Step into the Bay of Fundys surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures, including hundreds of thousands of seabirds, the worlds fastest predator, and a complex web of invertebrates.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Crossing the Danakil - The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Child of Fire - For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Gates of Hell - Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - Its a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wetlands - As water flows from Australia's highlands into the seas, an assortment of environmental niches set the stage for multifaceted interactions between predators and their prey.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Life Begins - For the first few weeks of life, the world is a frightening place. Danger lurks around every corner. It pays to be alert. Whether predator or prey. Any day might be your last. The race is on to grow up fast- for even the largest animals are vulnerable to attack.

programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Harmony Harbor - Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep1
programme.desc: Chicken at Sea / The Key Master - Archibald hits the high seas to help out endangered turtles. It's Archibald to the rescue when the citizens of Crackridge report a series of thefts.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep1
programme.desc: Rocky's in a Hole Lotta Trouble/The Great Invisi-Barrier - When Rocksy sinks to the bottom of a giant pond, her friends must figure out how to rescue her... without Rocksy's help. / When an invisible force-a-wall (a pane of glass) descends upon the yard and separates the Mighty Ones, Rocksy must figure out how to penetrate it so the group can be re-united.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep14
programme.desc: Pigs - Toby's ninja brother Brandt returns to San Lorenzo, and Puss agrees to help him reunite with his brothers to get them out of town.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".
